name: Arrow Symbol
description: An arrow symbol that points in a specified direction and may flash.

fields.name: Activation Variable
fields.description: The local variable number that triggers or activates this actor. (0 = always active)

fields.name: Direction
fields.description: Defines the direction the arrow symbol points towards.

0.name: East
0.description: The arrow points to the East.

1.name: West
1.description: The arrow points to the West.

2.name: North
2.description: The arrow points to the North.

3.name: South
3.description: The arrow points to the South.

fields.name: Flashing
fields.description: Indicates whether the arrow symbol flashes.
